text: Montana State University – Bozeman is a public university in Bozeman, Montana. The university has about 13,559 students. It was founded in 1893. The current president of the university is Waded Cruzado. ==Sports== The men's athletics teams of the university are called the Bobcats. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the Big Sky Conference. ==Other websites== *Montana State University – Bozeman's Official website *Montana State Bobcats' Official athletics website Category:Big Sky Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Montana Category:Buildings and structures in Montana
title: Montana State University
